xmlText.p: First Period_1, Tampa Bay, Kunitz 11 (Stamkos, Sustr), 1:41. 2, Toronto, van Riemsdyk 26 (Rielly, Hainsey), 8:49. 3, Toronto, Marner 17 (Gardiner, Zaitsev), 9:52. Penalties_Plekanec, TOR, (roughing), 16:20.
